# local-Layer
>

## Installation


```bash
npm install local-Layer
```

Dependencies

```bash
Input the dependencies of widgets
```

## How to build

 * code
 * change your name and email by edite package.json
 * npm run server
 * npm run demo
 * npm run add
 * npm run commit
 * npm run push
 * npm run pull
 * npm run newbranch
 * npm run branch
 * npm publish
 * http://localhost:3000

## How to publish
 * npm set registry http://npm-dev.huangbaoche.com
 * npm login : login m-dev.huangbaoche.com
 * npm publish

## How to use
 ```
 new module_name({});
 opt.wrap = $(this._option.wrap || '#wrap') || $('body')
 opt.name : this.name,
 opt.uuid : _uuid(),
 opt.msg : this.option.msg || '信息不正确'

 ```
